Mevenide provides a multipart POM editor (Screenshot below). Each page is kept in synch with the source page. If the POM is inherited (i.e. ${pom.extend} is not empty) then a checkbox will be present next to each field allowing you to specify if the field is inherited (Screenshot 2 below); in that case the field will be read-only.
